Posts.Content: Aug 13, 2015 08:46AM stephvsm wrote: Hi, I have had an ultrasound that showed the lymph node but they said it's not concerning. and to come back in 6 months. The surgeon said she doesn't think it's Paget's. Because there is not crusting or flaking.
Posts.Title: Nipple Biopsy waiting for results stephvsm Miabangs

Posts.Content: stephvsm wrote: I just had a punch biopsy on my right nipple. It has been severely itchy for a long time. I have gone to the doctor, had mammograms and utlrasound and nothing shows up except an enlarged lymph node. but the doctors are not concerned. I have had 2 lumpectomy's on the same breast both benign. I am really frustrated because I have been to the dermatologist and it isn't eczema or anything like that. I don't have crusty or flaking. Just major itching and the areola is slightly darker than the left one. Has anyone had anything like this that comes back as cancer or Paget's? I feel like I am crazy because the doctors keep saying nothing is wrong. thanks. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Nipple Biopsy waiting for results stephvsm Miabangs
